## Introduction

This is an example analysis file.

```{r setup, echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Plot example

```{r figure-demo, echo = TRUE}
tibble(x = rnorm(1000)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "darkblue", alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_bw()
```
